post.description: Check when only If-Match in header is defined.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The request should only proceed if an entity matches this string.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

head.description: Check when only If-Modified-Since in header is defined.

parameters.name: If-Modified-Since
parameters.description:
A timestamp indicating the last modified time of the resource known to the
client. The operation will be performed only if the resource on the service has
been modified since the specified time.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

post.description: Check when only If-None-Match in header is defined.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: The request should only proceed if no entity matches this string.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.

post.description: Check when only If-Unmodified-Since in header is defined.

parameters.name: If-Unmodified-Since
parameters.description:
A timestamp indicating the last modified time of the resource known to the
client. The operation will be performed only if the resource on the service has
not been modified since the specified time.

204.description: There is no content to send for this request, but the headers may be useful.
